column1: burnie louis collins| lawsonville burnie louis collins
column8: at his residence. a private graveside service will be held saturday
column11: at the shelton family cemetery on moore rd. mr. collins was born january 2
column13: in stokes county to the late joel thomas and nina mae harger collins. he was a machine operator at tultex and was of the baptist faith. in addition to his parents
column14: he was preceded in death by his sister
column17: joel thomas collins. survivors include his wife
column22: ashley springer. colonial funeral home stokes chapel in sandy ridge is serving the family.
